Warmth is not so warm, like start to late fall if sweater/jackets are not worn. Not warm, but good as wrap around shoulders and for meditation. Not too thick, but it certainly is heavy. You can feel its weight. Style is excellent, width is slightly less, but its purpose is not to be used like wider shawls. Its a smart one definitely. I like it and thought of buying more, but because of fuzz i will not. I will rather go for real cashmere from India.

评论概述: Multiple defects, unraveling overlock edge finish
评论详情: I ordered three of these and each was of a different quality.  While they look amazing right out of the package, and I loved them on sight, the small defects and irregularities led to disappointment.  The fabric appears similar, but each of the shawls showed a different amount of wear after gentle washing and hanging dry. They should not show wear at all before they’re worn!  For fashion, I’d not order again because it’s obvious these will not stand up to wear and they are smaller than listed. For display, you might be able to make it work if you avoid the sad attempt to dupe Hermès.  All orders were fulfilled by amazon and were returnable. I would not recommend vendor direct shipping due to the variability in quality and exorbitant cost of return shipping.  Update 11/26/24: I regret ordering these.  You can see from the photos on the blue and gray how the nap has lifted and pilled before use, and also the irreparable snag. The big snag is at the most visible part of the shawl when worn.  On the pink and gray, you can clearly see what has happened at the edges, and is happening on all of the shawls.  Lengthwise edges are finished with an overlock stitch, but just an abruptly ended overlock. Nothing to hold it like a bar tack or back stich. So obviously it is going to unravel the full length.  From three stars to zero for this regrettable waste of money.
I’m using this as a throw on my living room chair.
